📺 Simulcast 》Crunchyroll

#神の雫 #TheDropsOfGod #DropsOfGod #アニメ #Anime #AnimeNews

embed.alt:
Mit einem neuen Visual und einem neuen Trailer gaben die Verantwortlichen den genauen Starttermin offiziell bekannt. Der Anime startet am 10. April bei Crunchyroll  im  Simulcast und im japanischen TV. Zudem wurden weitere Mitglieder des japanischen Sprechercasts offiziell vorgestellt.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Shizuku Kanzaki ist der Sohn des legendären Weinkritikers Yutaka Kanzaki und hasst alles, was mit Wein zu tun hat. Nach dem Tod seines Vaters zwingt dessen Testament ihn in ein irrwitziges Duell: Wer die „12 Apostel“ und die legendären „Drops of God“ richtig erkennt, erbt Sammlung und Anwesen. Doch Shizuku steht ohne Verkosterfahrung dem Adoptivsohn Issei Tomine, dem „Prince of Wine“, gegenüber. Ein Jahr Zeit, null Routine und ein Wettlauf gegen die Uhr.

It’s hard watching school kids sucked in to this. They sit for hours on end watching bursts of soul crushing crap, then ask ChatGPT to do their homework. 

Future generations are nothing but Morlocks now.
“Hey do you remember when you weren’t at the party because you were at home shitting out your insides for amoebic dysentery? Well, now you were thanks to FakerFoto.”
Yeah it’s just channel surfing for another generation. The effects are even more harmful now. I think TikTok has perhaps been the absolute worst of all for cementing the rot.

India gets this. China gets this. The US gets this.

external.description:
Kate Fox says Joe Ceccanti was the ‘most hopeful person’ before he started spending 12 hours a day with a chatbot

On 7 August, Kate Fox received a phone call that upended her life. A medical examiner said that her husband, Joe Ceccanti – who had been missing for several hours – had jumped from a railway overpass and died. He was 48.

Fox couldn’t believe it. Ceccanti had no history of depression, she said, nor was he suicidal – he was the “most hopeful person” she had ever known. In fact, according to the witness accounts shared with Fox later, just before Ceccanti jumped, he smiled and yelled: “I’m great!” to the rail yard attendants below when they asked him if he was OK. Continue reading...
external.title: Her husband wanted to use ChatGPT to create sustainable housing. Then it took over his life.

ChatGPT ist eh so viel schlechter geworden. 

Claude wurde allerdings mit Millionen von Copyright geschützter Bücher trainiert. Auch nicht so geil.

Das neue Heizungsgesetz ist schon wirklich an Dämlichkeit nicht zu überbieten. Aber der gigantische Mittelfinger, den man damit Mietern, DER MEHRHEIT DER BEVÖLKERUNG, zeigt ist schon wirklich ekelhaft.

Mein Kommentar zum BVB-Spiel:

Wer Kovac verpflichtet, bekommt Kovac-Loser-Ball.

Ce soir, je vous propose un voyage intérieur,

record.text:
Kam zum Cappuccino alles wie erwartet:

»So kannst Du das doch nicht sagen.«

Und: »Mach das doch nicht.«

Nun: doch. Und ich hasse alle daran.

value.text:
Und morgen Vormittag zum Cappuccino wird wieder einer (Grüße! 😘) sagen: »Das kannst Du so doch nicht sagen.«

Und wieder werde ich antworten: »Das könnt Ihr so doch nicht machen.«

Dann höre ich mir Rechtfertigungen und Relativierungen an. Und is' der Kaffee dann auf, höre ich: Du hast ja Recht.

images.alt:
Sam Altman tweet:

Tonight, we reached an agreement with the Department of War to deploy our models in their classified network.

In all of our interactions, the DoW displayed a deep respect for safety and a desire to partner to achieve the best possible outcome.

AI safety and wide distribution of benefits are the core of our mission. Two of our most important safety principles are prohibitions on domestic mass surveillance and human responsibility for the use of force, including for autonomous weapon systems.  The DoW agrees with these principles, reflects them in law and policy, and we put them into our agreement.

We also will build technical safeguards to ensure our models behave as they should, which the DoW also wanted. We will deploy FDEs to help with our models and to ensure their safety, we will deploy on cloud networks only.

We are asking the DoW to offer these same terms to all AI companies, which in our opinion we think everyone should be willing to accept. We have expressed our strong desire to see things de-escalate away from legal and governmental actions and towards reasonable agreements.

We remain committed to serve all of humanity as best we can. The world is a complicated, messy, and sometimes dangerous place.

Introduction: In the rapidly evolving landscape of cybersecurity and open-source intelligence (OSINT), a developer has released a production-grade system on GitHub that visualizes global threats,…

external.description: Introduction: In the rapidly evolving landscape of cybersecurity and open-source intelligence (OSINT), a developer has released a production-grade system on GitHub that visualizes global threats, conflicts, and geopolitical events in real time. Known as "worldmonitor.app," this platform aggregates over 36 live data layers—from military flights and naval traffic to satellite fire detection and economic sanctions—into a unified interactive map. For security professionals, this represents a masterclass in systems integration, AI-driven classification, and live data architecture, demonstrating how to move beyond simple dashboards toward actionable intelligence platforms.

【狐の窓～ゆるっと怪異～　～キャラクター＆作品紹介～】

「狐の窓」――それは特別な指の組み方をし、その穴(窓)から覗くと目には見えない不思議なものを見れる能力のこと。
狐の窓の使い手である主人公・ナギと、人間界に潜むさまざまな妖怪たちとの出会いや交流を描く物語。

Characters

Nagi
A human boy (?) who works at the Shinonome Detective Agency.
Ren’s assistant, and well accustomed to interacting with yokai.

Jin
A cool, middle-aged man with an interest in machinery.
His true identity is a Karasu Tengu.

Komako
A two-tailed cat yokai who plays detective with Nagi.
Often disguises herself as a human girl.

Hibiki
A kind-hearted big brother who dedicates his days to otaku activities.
His true identity is a former oni from Hell.

Kanata
A human who can see yokai.
Accepted Yoroboshi and now treats him as a beloved pet.

Yoroboshi
A slightly timid curse god.
Quiet in nature, but having served as a curse god for many years,
impurities constantly drift from his body.

Sanae
An energetic and cheerful older sister figure.
Currently looking for a boyfriend.
Her true identity is a Futakuchi-onna.

external.description:
Update: Strike on Iranian girl's school kills 24

At least 24 people have been killed after an Israeli strike hit a school in Iran, local officials told Tasnim News Agency.

Middle East Eye’s correspondent in Iran reported that the attack occurred at around 11:30 a.m. local time, striking Shajareh Tayyebeh Elementary School in Minab, Hormozgan Province, in southern Iran. 

All of the victims were girls, aged between seven and 12. At least 45 others were wounded.

Many students were trapped under the rubble, with 170 female pupils in the school at the time.
external.title: Update: Strike on Iranian girl's school kills 24

images.alt:
Sam Altman tweet:

Tonight, we reached an agreement with the Department of War to deploy our models in their classified network.

In all of our interactions, the DoW displayed a deep respect for safety and a desire to partner to achieve the best possible outcome.

AI safety and wide distribution of benefits are the core of our mission. Two of our most important safety principles are prohibitions on domestic mass surveillance and human responsibility for the use of force, including for autonomous weapon systems.  The DoW agrees with these principles, reflects them in law and policy, and we put them into our agreement.

We also will build technical safeguards to ensure our models behave as they should, which the DoW also wanted. We will deploy FDEs to help with our models and to ensure their safety, we will deploy on cloud networks only.

We are asking the DoW to offer these same terms to all AI companies, which in our opinion we think everyone should be willing to accept. We have expressed our strong desire to see things de-escalate away from legal and governmental actions and towards reasonable agreements.

We remain committed to serve all of humanity as best we can. The world is a complicated, messy, and sometimes dangerous place.
